name: Kidou's Adventure
description:
Jump into a challenging platform game adventure with the little  Spaceboy named Kidou And WIN PRIZES IN REAL LIFE!!!! 
 controls never been so easy and accurate. Run, jump  just by keys but watch out of full level spikes and enemies. Collect coins  throughout your quest to open new even more challenging levels

• Awesome challenging levels
• Easy to learn and addictive gameplay
